actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to extend as an emergency measure for 1 year the District of Columbia Medical and Dental Manpower Act of 1970.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Medical and Dental Manpower Act to extend through fiscal year 1977 the authority of the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants to nonprofit medical and dental schools.

titles.title: A bill to extend as an emergency measure for 1 year the District of Columbia Medical and Dental Manpower Act of 1970.
